    ps_3_0
    def c3, 1.5, 3, 0.75, 2
    def c6, 0.816496611, 0.577350259, 0, 0.333333343
    def c7, -9.99999997e-007, 1.20000005, 0, 0
    def c13, 0, 2, 1, 1.5
    def c14, -0.707106769, -0.408248305, 0.577350259, 0.707106769
    dcl_texcoord2_pp v0.xyz
    dcl_texcoord3_pp v1.xyz
    dcl_texcoord4 v2
    dcl_texcoord6 v3.xyz
    dcl_texcoord5 v4.xyw
    dcl_texcoord v5.xy
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s15

// Unreal Engine SceneColorTexture halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --fix-unreal-halo-sct --only-autofixed --stereo-sampler-ps=s15 CRC32_D0415F65_1070.txt
mov r30.xyw, v4
texldl r31, c220.z, s15
add r31.w, r30.w, -r31.y
mad r30.x, r31.w, r31.x, r30.x

    rcp r0.x, r30.w
    mul r0.xy, r0.x, r30
    mad r0.xy, r0, c1, c1.wzzw
    mov r0.zw, c13.x
    texldl r0, r0, s0
    mov r1.zw, c13
    add r0.x, r1.z, -c2.y
    add r0.x, -r0.x, r0.w
    rcp r0.x, r0.x
    mad r0.x, -c2.x, r0.x, -r30.w
    rcp r0.y, c11.z
    mul_sat r0.x, r0.y, r0.x
    mad r0.yz, v5.xxyw, r1.w, c9.xxyw
    texld r2, r0.yzzw, s1
    mul r0.y, r2_abs.w, r2_abs.w
    mul r0.y, r0.y, r0.y
    mul r0.y, r0.y, r2_abs.w
    add r0.z, r2_abs.w, c7.x
    cmp r0.y, r0.z, r0.y, c13.x
    mov r3, c3
    mad r0.zw, v5.xyxy, r3, c10.xyxy
    texld r4, r0.zwzw, s1
    mul r0.z, r4_abs.w, r4_abs.w
    mul r0.z, r0.z, r0.z
    mul r0.z, r0.z, r4_abs.w
    add r0.w, r4_abs.w, c7.x
    add r1.xyw, r2.xyzz, r4.xyzz
    cmp r0.z, r0.w, r0.z, c13.x
    lrp r2.x, r0.y, r0.z, r0.y
    dp3 r0.y, v3, v3
    rsq r0.y, r0.y
    mad r0.z, v3.z, -r0.y, c13.z
    mul r2.yzw, r0.y, v3.xxyz
    cmp r0.y, r2.w, r0_abs.z, c13.z
    mad r2.yzw, r2.w, c13.xxxy, -r2
    add r0.z, r0.y, c7.x
    pow r3.z, r0.y, c7.y
    cmp r0.y, r0.z, r3.z, c13.x
    add r0.y, r0.y, c11.y
    mad r0.x, r0.y, r0.x, r2.x
    add r0.y, -r2_abs.y, c13.z
    mul_pp oC0.w, r0.y, r0.x
    dp2add_sat_pp r0.x, r2.zwzw, c6, c6.z
    dp3_sat_pp r0.y, r2.yzww, c14
    dp3_sat_pp r0.z, r2.zwyw, c14.yzww
    mul_pp r0.xyz, r0, r0
    mul_pp r0.xyz, r0, r0
    mul_pp r0.xyz, r0, r0
    mul_pp r0.xyz, r0, r0
    dp3_pp r0.x, v1, r0
    mul r0.yzw, c5.xxyz, v0.xxyz
    mul r0.xyz, r0.x, r0.yzww
    mad r2.xy, v5, r3, c8
    texld r2, r2, s1
    add r1.xyw, r1, r2.xyzz
    add r2.xyz, r1.z, -c0
    mul_pp r1.xyz, r1.xyww, r2
    mad_pp r1.xyz, r1, c4.w, c4
    dp3_pp r0.w, v1, c6.w
    mul_pp r2.xyz, r0.w, v0
    mad_pp r0.xyz, r1, r2, r0
    add_pp r0.xyz, r0, c0
    mad_pp r0.xyz, r1, c12, r0
    mad_pp oC0.xyz, r0, v2.w, v2
